rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0001
rows.name: Thanks for coming all this way, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Since you're here, I'll tell you an
interesting story, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0004
rows.name:
A Driver should be training their heart day and night
to resonate with a superior Blade, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0005
rows.name:
But when it comes to resonating, only the
strongest part of the heart matters at all, mo!

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0006
rows.name:
For example, for a person with strong courage,
only courage affects the resonance, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0007
rows.name: The other three have no relation at all, mo!

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0008
rows.name: Fufufu, I finally said it, mo!
